text: MV Salahuddin-2 was a ferry that sank in the Meghna River south of Dhaka, Bangladesh in the night of 3 May 2002, killing more than 450 people. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * ==External links== * Maritime Matters Shipping News: Passenger ship and cruise news from around the world, Jan 2002 to June 2002 Category:Ferries of Bangladesh Category:Maritime incidents in Bangladesh Category:Maritime incidents in 2002 Category:Shipwrecks in rivers Category:2002 in Bangladesh
title: MV Salahuddin-2
